Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal

[Groovy] Class UpToDateCheck

    • org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs.internal.UpToDateCheck

    • Collection of class methods for determining how up to date a destination is compared to a source.

      Authors:
      Schalk W. Cronj√©
      Since:
      1.0

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          static boolean forCopySpec(Logger logger, VFS vfs, VfsCopySpec rootSpec, VfsURI destRoot, boolean noSourceModifiedDateCheck)
          Checks whether the source is newer than the destination.
          static boolean forUriCollection(Logger logger, VFS vfs, VfsURICollection sources, java.lang.Object destRoot, boolean noSourceModifiedDateCheck)
          Iterates over all of the file hierarchy within in VfsURICollection and checks whether the equivalent file would exist on a target.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

      • Method Detail

        • static boolean forCopySpec(Logger logger, VFS vfs, VfsCopySpec rootSpec, VfsURI destRoot, boolean noSourceModifiedDateCheck)

          Checks whether the source is newer than the destination. Only dates on files are checked, folders are not.

          Returns:
          true is destination is considered older than source
          Parameters:
          logger
          vfs
          rootSpec
          destRoot
          noSourceModifiedDateCheck - Don't check the source modification dates

        • static boolean forUriCollection(Logger logger, VFS vfs, VfsURICollection sources, java.lang.Object destRoot, boolean noSourceModifiedDateCheck)

          Iterates over all of the file hierarchy within in VfsURICollection and checks whether the equivalent file would exist on a target. If the source and remote schemes support GET_MODIFIED_DATE, then those dates would also be used as part of the up-to-date decision

          Returns:
          false as soon as the first remote target does not exist or is older than the source.
          Parameters:
          logger
          vfs
          sources
          destRoot
          noSourceModifiedDateCheck - Don't check the source modification dates
